A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is the most ambiguous movie of all saga.There is a lot of \"strange\" moments in this film\,but there is a lot of unexpected twists\,which will blow your mind.Visual effects\,actors are amazing.The story is the best of all Star Wars\,but it is one of the best Star Wars movies on my opinion.\nDmitriy Gerasymov(Ukraine)
